name: Dino Dawn
description: Dino Dawn is a platformer game about adventure of the Dinosaur in which it needs to rescue eggs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i3 or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 180 MB available space Sound Card: compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i3 or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: compatible
